childMarkdownRemark.html: I will be giving a talk on Artificial Intelligence and Robotics at the Liceo Statale Ghandi in Casoria, Italy.
I presented my work named Exploring Non-Verbal Strategies for Initiating an HRI in the interactive poster session of the International Conference of Social Robotics ICSR2022 held in Florence, Italy.

I presented my work named On The Emotional Transparency of a Non-Humanoid Social Robot in the interactive poster session of the International Conference of Social Robotics ICSR2022 held in Florence, Italy.
I co-presented the work named Familiar Acoustic Cues for Legible Service Robots in the 2022 IEEE International Conference on Robot and Human Interactive (ROMAN2022) held in Naples, Italy.
I was interviewed by the local newspaper ForliToday about how my career developed in Italy as well as in Germany and how I feel about the future of robotics.
The work The Role of Closed-Loop Hand Control in Handshaking Interactions has been awarded as Finalist for Best Paper Award in HRI at the ICRA 2019 conference.
I presented my career to the students of (my old) highschool in Forli ITE Matteucci, where I had the opportunity to share my experience as a researcher and my passion for robotics.
